name: NOTES_MC_NMM
description: This table contains the information about notes (HNO) records attached to case (NMM) records.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique internal id of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the note attached to the case.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record attached to the case.

columns.name: NOTE_DATE
columns.description: The date when the note was created.

columns.name: NOTE_TIME
columns.description: The time the note was created.

columns.name: NOTE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created the note.

columns.name: NOTE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
